name: podamShouldHandleGenericsInStaticConstructorsDuringPojoInstantiation

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.GenericInStaticConstructorPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type class java.lang.String

title: Podam should handle generics in static constructors during POJO instantiation
